vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Sa.25.3; married to David (H1732) and Nabal (H5037);
mother of: Chileab (H3609)
§ Abigail = "my father is joy"
1) wife of Nabal, then of David
2) sister of David
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a) אֲבִיגַל   esposa de Nabal y David; (b) אֲבִיגַל   hija de Nahasón; hermana de David
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞比該 这个陰性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "我父是喜樂"
1) 拿八的妻子, 後嫁給大衛
2) 大衛的姊妹 (代上 2:16,17)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
亚比该 这个阴性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "我父是喜乐"
1) 拿八的妻子, 后嫁给大卫
2) 大卫的姊妹 (代上 2:16,17)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.17.25;
daughter of: Nahash (H5176I) and Nahash (H5176I)(?);
sister of: David (H1732)(?), Eliab (H0446I)(?), Abinadab (H0041I)(?), Shimeah (H8093)(?), Nethanel (H5417H)(?), Raddai (H7288)(?), Ozem (H0684)(?), Zeruiah (H6870)(?), Abigail (H0026H)(?) and Elihu (H0453J)(?); married to Jether (H3500H);
mother of: Amasa (H6021)
§ Abigail = "my father is joy"
1) wife of Nabal, then of David
2) sister of David
